body:
Alter View PV60_DurusEkle_Terbiye
As
Select  PCS.TPulseCikanStateID, PCS.TPulseCikanID, PCS.PulseStateID, PCS.BasMt, PCS.BasZaman, PCS.PersonelID, PCS.MakinaBolumID, PCS.PulseCikanStateBolgeID,
        PCS.MakinaID, PCS.Aciklama, dbo.F05_BitimSureText(99, ISNULL(PCS.BasZaman, GETDATE()), ISNULL(PCS.BitZaman, GETDATE()), 0) DurusSure,
        P.PersonelAdi BasPersonelAdi, PS.PulseStateName DurusNedenKodu, M.MakinaNo
From    IT60_TPulseCikanState PCS
        Left Outer Join IT60_PulseState PS On PS.PulseStateID = PCS.PulseStateID
        Left Outer Join dbo.IT01_Personel P On P.PersonelID = PCS.PersonelID
		LEFT OUTER JOIN IT01_Makinalar M On M.MakinaID = PCS.MakinaID
Go
